p: MIC - Table II represents the MIC values corresponding to the C. verum EO and the positive control chlorhexidine digluconate. Both C. verum and chlorhexidine digluconate exhibited a similar efficacy on planktonic C. albicans (ATCC MYA-2876) and C. dubliniensis (ATCC MYA-646). C tropicalis (ATCC 750) was more susceptible for chlorhexidine digluconate compared to C. verum leaf oil.
